item.description:
Salut et joyeux printemps a tout le monde!

Pour notre reunion du mercredi 11 avril, je propose un sujet:

*** Nos Voyages ***

Que chacun de nous raconte une aventure qui s'est passe pendant un voyage inoubliable.

Oui, oui, sortez vos dictionnaires et preparez une petite histoire pour le groupe. Ce sera marrant!

Venez nous joindre, on va parler des choses qui font sourire!

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
For our meeting on Wed., April 11, I suggest a topic:

*** Our Travels ***

Each of us is invited to tell about something that happened to them during an unforgettable trip.

Yup, that's right, get out your dictionary and get ready to tell a little story to the group. It'll be fun.

Come join us, we'll talk of things that make us smile!

A bientot,

Amy
item.name: April Meetup
